verses.roman:
yāṅra bhagavattā haite anyera bhagavattā
'svayaṁ-bhagavān'-śabdera tāhātei sattā

synonyms: yāṅra—of whom; bhagavattā—the quality of being the Supreme Personality of Godhead; haite—from; anyera—of others; bhagavattā—the quality of being the Supreme Personality of Godhead; svayam-bhagavān-śabdera—of the word svayaṁ-bhagavān; tāhātei—in that; sattā—the presence.
translation: "Only the Personality of Godhead, the source of all other Divinities, is eligible to be designated svayaṁ bhagavān, or the primeval Lord.
